body: i mean the artstyle was good but, damn, this is fucked up and I'm here sitting in the corner of my room telling myself WHY TF CHEATING IS A THING damn, it hurts right here in my meow meow
10/10 would read again, the artstyle is gorgeous
The art quality was good, and the plot was good too, but last few pages were not edited well
This is just the tip of the iceberg, the decision she makes creates a spiral that cant be stop and the fallout is in her hands.

You know.... when I first looked at the raws I though maaaybe he was blackmailing her or something like that so that made a little sense..... then here he just said a couple sweet words and she's all jelly in his hands ????

What the fuck happened to "He can have all the money and materialistic goods he can, it doesn't matter without true happiness." ??!!?

The moment some better off dude starts hitting on her she completely changed her tune, such a fucking Hypocrite.

It's actually making, whatever story the author tries to even make, even dumber. 

The fathers face when the brat caught him fucking the slut is priceless like "You have no right to Judge me here" The punch was soooo satisfying even though the dad was also an asshole.
Yea this actually kinda sad to watch tbh. he doesnt even love or even sort of have any affection for her just slowly making her a pet and the girl is just even worse tbh,
Combining a 3D background with 2D drawn characters looks horrible. I'd rather draw both the character(s) and the background or might as well make the characters 3D as well.

Wow, even the page cutting is worst, the story still the best
The way he taming her and guide her to his sex friend and betray her husband is the key of how good this manhwa hentai. Also his dad did it too to his secretary. Its awesome for an ntr lovers. 
Lol

hypergamous female + rapey self absorbed rich heir = Every pornhwa...

Is this why marriage rates are plummating in Korea ?
